plot: When one of the most prolific art forgers in US history is finally exposed, he must confront the legacy of his 30-year con.
title: Art and Craft
plot_es: When one of the most prolific art forgers in US history is finally exposed, he must confront the legacy of his 30-year con.
plot_en: When one of the most prolific art forgers in US history is finally exposed, he must confront the legacy of his 30-year con.
